title: Plum Garden Yuantong Vegetarian
description: Buddhist restaurant offering vegetarian buffet, at 福田区深南大道泰然四路118号泰安轩B座1楼, which is southwest of Chegongmiao metro station. The entrance actually fronts onto Tairan 9th Road, and is in between Tairan 2nd Road and Tairan 4th Road. Large place and big selection of food. There are also private rooms where you can order a la carte dishes instead of having a buffet. Stops selling buffet tickets at 1:30pm and 8pm.
streetAddress: Floor 1, Block B Antaixuan, 118 Tairan 4th Rd, Futian District
